name: commRing_strongRankCondition
initialProofState:
R : Type u_1
inst✝¹ : CommRing R
inst✝ : Nontrivial R
⊢ StrongRankCondition R
decl:

instance (priority := 100) commRing_strongRankCondition : StrongRankCondition R :=
